doc:
Jack Smith (film director) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jack_Smith_(film_director) 0 Jack Smith (November 14, 1932 – September 25, 1989) was an American filmmaker, actor, and pioneer of underground cinema. He is generally acclaimed as a founding father of American performance art, and has been critically recognized as a master photographer, though his photographic works are rare and remain largely unknown. Jack_Smith ( November_14_,_1932 – September_25_,_1989 ) was an_American_filmmaker , actor , and pioneer of underground_cinema . He is generally acclaimed as a_founding_father of American_performance_art , and has_been_critically_recognized as a_master_photographer , though his_photographic_works are rare and remain largely_unknown .
